author: Web Team
title: Watch: SRK takes AbRam for ride on Mumbai roads - Khaleej Times
text: Watch: SRK takes AbRam for ride on Mumbai roads Web Team /Mumbai Filed on February 21, 2017 Share Vote Shah Rukh Khan has often shared pictures and videos of his moments with AbRam Bollywood superstar Shah Rukh Khan was recently spotted on the Mumbai roads in his open top BMW convertible with his youngest son, AbRam. A video posted by one of SRK's fans shows AbRam in the passenger seat of the car with a man from Shah Rukh Khan's team. Khan drives the car while conversing with the son. The father-son duo caught the attention of the onlookers who stopped to take the glimpse of the superstar. Shah Rukh Khan has often shared pictures and videos of his moments with AbRam. Take a look: - S R K ? (@kadey1122) February 20, 2017 SRK @iamsrk with Cute Son #AbRam Enjoying Open Car Ride On Mumbai Roads .. ??? pic.twitter.com/98J1aC9dZT
